assignments.name: Title
assignments.value: ={{ $('receive_topic').item.json['What is the title of the content?'] }}

assignments.name: Word Count
assignments.value: ={{ $('receive_topic').item.json['How many words should the content have?'] }}

assignments.name: Primary Keyword
assignments.value: ={{ $('receive_topic').item.json['What is the primary keyword for the content?'] }}

assignments.name: Secondary Keywords
assignments.value: ={{ $if($('receive_topic').item.json['What are the secondary keywords for the content?'].includes(','),$('receive_topic').item.json['What are the secondary keywords for the content?'].split(','),$('receive_topic').item.json['What are the secondary keywords for the content?']) }}

assignments.name: Internal Links
assignments.value: ={{ $if($('receive_topic').item.json['Are there any external links that should be included in the content?'].includes(','),$('receive_topic').item.json['Are there any internal links that should be included in the content?'].split(','),$('receive_topic').item.json['Are there any internal links that should be included in the content?']) }}

assignments.name: External Links
assignments.value: ={{ $if($('receive_topic').item.json['Are there any external links that should be included in the content?'].includes(','),$('receive_topic').item.json['Are there any external links that should be included in the content?'].split(','),$('receive_topic').item.json['Are there any external links that should be included in the content?']) }}

assignments.name: Additional Instructions
assignments.value: ={{ $('receive_topic').item.json['Additional instructions or specific requirements for the content.'] }}

nodes.name: change_section_format

values.content: You're a helpful, intelligent writing assistant
=Edit the following text to break up the flow. Add bullet points and subheadings where needed for variety. Use Markdown(atx) format.

=# Making use of AI Writing Tools

Incorporating AI into your writing workflow requires a strong understanding of the available tools and how they can boost your productivity. Whether you're a novel writer looking to streamline your plot development process or a content marketer aiming to optimize your SEO, AI tools can significantly enhance your efficiency. Among the most versatile tools is ChatGPT, designed by OpenAI. It assists with content generation, ideation, automatic formatting, and translation. Thanks to its machine learning capabilities, the quality of the content it helps generate improves over time based on your input and feedback.

For those primarily concerned with editing and proofreading, tools like Grammarly and ProWritingAid offer high-quality solutions to streamline the QA process. Using natural language processing, these tools instantly assess your writing for grammatical errors, stylistic issues, and clarity improvements. Both Grammarly and ProWritingAid provide real-time suggestions, allowing you to refine your writing quickly and efficiently. They also offer detailed reports to help you understand patterns in your writing and areas for improvement.

# Making use of AI Writing Tools

Incorporating AI into your writing workflow requires a strong understanding of the available tools and how they can boost your productivity. Whether you're a novel writer looking to streamline your plot development process or a content marketer aiming to optimize your SEO, below are a few of the hottest AI tools you can use to improve your productivity.

## AI Writing Tools

Among the most versatile is ChatGPT, designed by OpenAI. This tool is designed to assist with:

- Content generation,
- Ideation,
- Automatic formatting, &
- Translation

Thanks to its machine learning capabilities, the quality of the content it helps you generate even improves over time based on your input and feedback.

## AI Editing Tools

For those primarily concerned with editing and proofreading, on the other hand, here are a few high-quality tools you can use to skip the QA.

- Grammarly,
- ProWritingAid

Using natural language processing, these tools instantly assess your writing for grammatical errors, stylistic issues, and clarity improvements. Both Grammarly and ProWritingAid provide suggestions in real-time, allowing you to refine your writing quickly and efficiently. They also offer detailed reports that help you understand patterns in your writing and areas for improvement.

nodes.name: create_outline

values.content: You're a helpful, intelligent writing assistant
Use the following JSON brief to write an engaging, comprehensive outline in Markdown format (atx). Tone of voice 50% spartan, casual.

={
"title": "Accessibility in Retail: How to Make Ypur Store More Accessible",
"wordCount": 1000,
"primaryKeword":"accessibility in retail",
"secondaryKeywords":["accessible e-commerce", "how to make your website more accessible"],
"internalLinks": ["{{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}"],
"externalLinks": ["{{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}"]
"additionalinstructions": "Don't pitch the company at all - make it very informative and provide sa uch value as you can."
}

=# Accessibility in Retail: How to Make Your Store More Accessible.

Online arketplaces have become more popular since the mid-90swjen retail juggernauts like Amazon intially burst onto the scene. Amd while it's true that nearly everybody buyd products in e-commerce store these days, it's crucial to understand that not all consumers have the same needs. 
Over one billion people have diabilities worldwide, meaning up to 15% of the globale population may need assistive technology to use online shopping platforms. Addressing thei needs is critical if you want to maximize your reach & customer experience. 
So, how exactly does digital accessibility impact businesses, and what can we (practically) do bout it? Read on for answers below.

## Introduction
- Briefly define what "accessibility in retail" means.
- Highlight the importance of retail accessibility.

## Significance of Accessility in Retail
- Discuss how creating an accessible retail space can broaden market reach.
- Discuss some benefits of retail accessibility. 
- Share valuable insights about retail accessibility from [forbes]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}

## Exploring Accessible E-comerce: The New Normal in Retail
- Explain the rise and importance of e-commerce in today's retail landscape.
- Highlight how e-commerce has opened up more possibilities for accessibility in retail.

## Guidance to Make E-commerce Stores Accessible
- Present some of the key accessibility standards for online stores.
- Offer brief step-by-step guide on how to make your website accessible.
- INdicate the best practices in creating accessible e-commerce stores, citing resources from ["Ontario.ca"]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}

## Physical Store Accessibility: Not to be Overlooked
- Assert the need for physical store accessibility in addition to online stores.
- Enumerate practical solutions for enhancing physical store accessibility.

## Encouraging Continuous Efforts for Accessibility
- Inspire readers to continually strive for better accessibility in theire retail environments.
- Reiterate the benefits of and the need for accessibility in the retail sector for a more inclusive feature.

## Conclusion
- Sumarixe the key points and lessons learned about retail accessibility. 
- Encourage readers to implement the suggestions provided.

={
"title": "{{ $('topic_variables').item.json.Title }}",
"wordCount": {{ $('topic_variables').item.json['Word Count'] }},
"primaryKeyword":"{{ $('topic_variables').item.json['Primary Keyword'] }}",
"secondaryKeywords": {{ $('topic_variables').item.json['Secondary Keywords'] }},
"internaLinks": {{ $('topic_variables').item.json['Internal Links'] }},
"externalLinks": {{ $('topic_variables').item.json['External Links'] }},
"additionalinstructions":"{{ $('topic_variables').item.json['Additional Instructions'] }}"
}

nodes.notes: This openAi node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note

parameters.content:
## Overview
### This workflow automates the generation of high-quality content using AI and integrates with tools like Google Drive and Google Sheets for content management and organization.

## Key Features:
- ### **Form-Based Content Input**: Collects user inputs via a form, including title, word count, keywords, and additional instructions.
- ### **AI-Generated Content Outline**: Creates an outline using AI based on user inputs.
- ### **Detailed Section Processing**: Each section of the content is refined individually.
- ### **Content Aggregation**: Combines all sections into a cohesive article.
- ### **Document Management**:
      - Saves generated content and outlines to Google Drive.
      - Updates links to generated content in Google Sheets.

## Prerequisites:
- ### Google Drive and Google Sheets API: Ensure the respective OAuth2 credentials are configured in n8n.
- ### OpenAI API Key: Required for AI-powered content generation.

nodes.name: Sticky Note11

parameters.content:
## Next Steps: Automate Social Media Posting

- ### Your content creation process is now complete! You can take automation to the next level by integrating this workflow with social media platforms such as Twitter, LinkedIn, or Facebook.
    - Use the generated article to create tailored posts for each platform.
    - Add nodes for social media integrations (e.g., Twitter, Facebook, or LinkedIn API).
    - Schedule posts using a timestamp or trigger them based on specific events.

### This enhancement allows you to seamlessly distribute your content across multiple channels, ensuring a wider reach and saving even more time!

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Googledrive Workflow

## Overview
Automated workflow: Googledrive Workflow. This workflow integrates 14 different services: convertToFile, stickyNote, formTrigger, code, splitOut. It contains 49 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 49
- **Node Types**: 14
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **create_folder**: googleDrive
- **input_brief**: set
- **new_lines**: set
- **input_sections**: set
- **section_text**: set
- **Merge**: merge
- **Sort**: sort
- **Aggregate**: aggregate
- **final_article**: set
- **set_introduction**: set
- ... and 39 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
